title: Wedding Planner Book and Organizer for The Bride -Faux Leather, Gold Foil 'Future Mrs' Wedding Binder I Includes Pen, Bookmark & Stickers I Engagement Gifts for Women I Wedding Planning Book Checklist
descriptions:
Get ready to plan the wedding of your dreams with our exquisite Wedding Planner Book and Organizer for The Bride! Made with luxurious Faux Leather and adorned with elegant Gold Foil detailing that reads 'Future Mrs', this binder is a must-have for every bride-to-be.

Inside, you'll find a Gold Pen, a special Bookmark with the quote 'One step closer to marrying my soulmate', and 3 beautiful Stickers to add a touch of personalization to your planning. The interior features a stunning Green Leaf design, giving you a calming and nature-inspired space to organize your thoughts.

This planner is specifically designed for US weddings and includes essential planning features such as an 18-month undated calendar, a 12-month checklist, Budget Tracker, Guest Lists, Seating Planner, Vows section, and Vendor Contact Logs. The Golden open/close binder allows you to easily add, remove, or re-arrange pages to suit your needs.

Perfect for engagement gifts, this Wedding Planner Book is of high quality and customizable to make your planning experience truly unique. Support a Small US business and enjoy excellent customer service - contact us for any concerns or assistance. Plan your perfect day with style and ease - get your Wedding Planner Book and Organizer for The Bride today!
